app_descript:
Attractiveness Test

Brief

Discover your perceived attractiveness with the Attractiveness Test app! This innovative application utilizes advanced Artificial Intelligence to analyze a photo of your face and provides a numerical score on a scale from 1 to 10. Further deep insights into your age, gender, and more are also available, all powered by state-of-the-art Deep Learning and computer vision algorithms.

  • Facial Features Insights: Gain insights into your unique facial characteristics. üß†
  • Social Media Optimization: Identify your best pictures for sharing on social media and dating apps. üì∏
  • Celebrity Look-Alike: Discover your celebrity doppelg√§nger based on your facial features. üé≠
